If at time \\( t_1 \\) an operation is applied, modifying \\( x \\) to \\( Bx \\) (where \\( B \\) is another constant matrix), and then Fourier transformation is applied, would \\( F(T) \\) for \\( T > t_1 \\) depend solely on \\( A \\) and not affected by \\( B \\)?
Explanation: The intervention with \\( B \\) alters the state \\( x \\) at \\( t_1 \\), and consequently the subsequent trajectory is influenced by \\( B \\) as well as \\( A \\). Thus, \\( F(T) \\) will depend on both \\( A \\) and \\( B \\), reflecting changes due to the intervention.
